title: Primary education in England
brief_description: The Sea Mills Infant School in Bristol, one of the leading infant schools in England, is seen as an extension of the environment of home and family. This documentary film follows the interaction of teacher and children as the children’s energies and interests are directed toward self-selected learning activities. Suitable for teacher training. Narrated by Kathleen Brearley Andrews.
